ygData.subject: Can we influence Bards in next expansion?
ygData.msgSnippet: That s disappointing. So we have no effective stun, charm, AE Dot or AE mez when we are at the peak of our careers. I personally love crowd control and would
ygData.messageBody:
That's disappointing. So we have no effective stun, charm, AE Dot or AE
mez when we are at the peak of our careers. I personally love crowd
control and would love to see some of these (serious IMHO) deficiencies
addressed in the next expansion. Any thoughts on approaching VI with a
concerted effort? Regardless of whether they raise the level cap or just
throw in abilities (I've rumours of both) they could certainly address
this area.

Isn't it time we finally become the Pied Pipers of Norranth?

Tzeetch "51 songs sung and still trying to become a Bard"
Xegony

--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>
<tt>
It is resisted a lot against PCs close in level to you because it is
MR<BR>
based.  It has a 5-minute refresh time as well.<BR>
<BR>
Shada Iceheart [Retired]<BR>
<Afterlife><BR>
<BR>
<BR>
> At 55 you get Bombastic Bellow which is supposed to stun. Anyone
have<BR>
> experience using this? Does is use manna? Does is have a long <BR>
> recharge? Is<BR>
> it resisted easily since there's a DD component?<BR>
</tt>

<br>
